content: This is great! We really need to stop “REST-ing”. P.S: You’re right about this part “GraphQL might seem complex at first because it’s a technology that reaches across many areas of modern development” cos i picked up GraphQL 6 months ago with RelayJS, bad experience then checked it out few weeks ago with Apollo which opened my eye to some stuffs(polling, refetch, …). It was a great experience even as i had some issues with subscriptions which i ditched for socket.io, and everything worked fine 😍😍😍
